1.content:
You gain the power to swap?
A curse to swap?
A random global swap?
Maybe a game?
Or is a another method more appealing?
1.title: Which swap path?

11.content:
What does this power manifest as:
Power 1: Powered by thought, you can swap anything with any one at any time you want.
Power 2: swapnote, a note book that if you write a name and a trait, you will swap that with them, unless you specify otherwise, only you notice the change.
Power 3: A website, by typing in someones name and trait into the website, you can swap with them, unless you specify otherwise, only you notice the change.
Power 4: Powered by a stone on a necklace and your desire, When you desire something of someone else, you will swap with them, and unless you want it other wise, only you notice the change.
11.title: Gaining the power to swap

111.content:
How will people remember the swaps?

Exactly how you want, who remember, and how they remember, E.G. if you swap bodies with Bethany, but made her think it was entirely normal, while Lucy sees though this, and Julie thinks you are now her older sister, and Bethany her older brother.

Maybe it's their attention, so if they are looking, or listening to you, they will notice the swaps. E.G. swap kegs with you Mother, while playing games with your friend, and twin sister, you friend is focussing on the game, so it goes unnoticed to them, Lucy is thinking about you, and looking at you front he corner of her eyes, so she sees it, while Julie is observing you, so she sees it, but your mother is in another room, so she doesn't see it.
111.title: Swap by thought

1111.content: How do you gain this power? Perhaps it is given you you by someone/something? Do you just suddenly have it one day without knowing how or why? Or something else.
1111.title: Your choice

choices: Yes, but you don't believe it
114.content: Do you know about it's power?
114.title: Swap by jewelry

1142.content: so you have to try it out
1142.title: Yes, but you don't believe it

choices: Use it on your self and your family
11421.content:
"Unbelievable," you say,looking at the pendant in your hand.
"This trinket can swap traits and attributes," you scoff, "Can hurt to try..."
11421.title: yes

choices: Yes - I Want to be Able to Sing!
114211.content: Your third-cousin is an amazing singer. It wouldn't be that bad if you choose to swap abilities, would it?
114211.title: Use it on your self and your family

114212.content: Would you use it to trip the nosy neighbour who peeks in your window?
114212.title: Use it on people outside

11423.content: Maybe you go tell Lucy, who you are on good terms with, and try it, expecting nothing to happen.
11423.title: something else

choices: She call her friend, Sabrina, who was really into these swap kind of things
Swaps with you, (reader's choice on swap)
114231.content:
Walking over to Lucy's room, in no particular rush as your doubting this things power. You walked into her room to find her on her mp3 relaxing, which was irregular for her, but she has done it before. You sat at the end of her bed, and she pulled out her earphones.
"Lucy, remember that necklace. It say it can swap peoples trait around, I don't think it can but can hurt to try."
Lucy agrees, then.....
114231.title: Get Lucy

114232.content: Maybe you should get Sarah, your girls friend best friend, who is really interested in swaps?
114232.title: Sonething else

Clothing swap where if you wear twin sisters clothing and for a reason unknown to you only you twin suster clothes.

1153.title: Another Method

12.content: Which curse? All options are reader's choice
12.title: A curse to swap

choices: The next morning (the curse doesn't start until that point)
121.content:
Exploring a carnival at night, that your parents had force you to go to with them, and extremely bored, you notice a purple tent with golden patterns on it.
You hear a women next to the tent calling to you, not by name, you could see her face as she was wearing purple robes with a hood that cause a shade over her face.
You were a little interested in this, so you followed, inside, you could see it was a soothe seers tent, lite by candle light, crystal ball on the table in the center, and other fortune telling implements.
She went though various implement, telling your future, but you weren't listening.
Then she went to the crystal ball, asking you to look into it.
You did, but stopped listening again, until she spoke about your bad habit.
"You don't appreciate others, just like now, you haven't been listening at all."
"Well, maybe if they had anything for me to appreciate," you said standing up almost shouting, "And if you had any thing that's worth listening to."
"Well then, " she said with anger in her voice, "Maybe you should experience it your self, I curse you too swap with any one you touch."
You looked at her with a disbelieving expression.
"Be gone," she shouted loudly, the candles went out, and everything went dark. When you could see again, the tent was empty.
You left.
121.title: Mystic curse

choices: You go back to the soothsayer's tent and ask her to swap you back.
You go to find a witch to help you undo the curse.
1211.content:
You go out the tent, thinking to yourself, “I’m not worried, I don’t believe in that woman’s curse will happen.”
You go to your friend’s house by taxi. When you arrive, you go inside the house and sit on the sofa in the living room. There is a big Brazil cat in its basket drinking milk. Your friend Pam comes into the living room dressed in a green dress with a yellow ribbon on her head.
When she sees you she says: “Hello Fae, what a nice surprise. I didn’t hear you come in.”
“I’ve been in the soothsayer’s tent. She put a curse on me!”
“Really?” Pam asks.
“Yeah, can you believe it? What a load of nonsense.”
“Aren’t you worried? What did she say?”
“She said I would swap with anyone I touch”
“Oh my god! That’s terrible, have you touched anyone yet?”
“No, but we can try if you don’t mind...”
“I’m not sure... OK I guess it wouldn’t hurt”
You stand up and walk over to your friend. You look at each other, take a deep breath, and slowly touch her arm...
Suddenly there is a loud voice laughing and saying “NOW YOU WILL FEEL SCARED!”
The next thing you know you are looking back at yourself. The other you lets out a short scream and says “They’ve turned you into me”
“Wait a minute, you look like me!”
“Aargh!” you both say together, and turn to look in the mirror.
The soothsayers curse had happened after all. You have swapped places with Pam.
1211.title: Later on, you touch someone

1212.content:
After a night of gullible being cautious around everyone, making sure not to touch them, and being angry at your self for falling for it.
You wake up the next morning, having not touch any one.
"Gaaah," you growled, "I'm such an idiot for believe that!"
You got up, prepared for the day. And walked out the room, but you hadn't noticed that........... was coming the other way, and you were both knocked to the floor.
(Reader's choice on the swap)
1212.title: The next morning (the curse doesn't start u...

choices: Someone kicked you by accident (reader choice on who and what swaps)
12122.content:
You felt someone same smash into you, knocking you to the floor.
Opened your eyes, panicking because you touch someone.
You saw Julie in front of your looking the same as always, but the shock came when she spoke.
"Oh, sorry brother, I didn't see you,2 she said in a voice that was a lot deeper than what you were used to when coming from her, it reminded you of a teenage boy, and it was strangely familiar.
"Your forgiven," you said in a high pitch, sweet little voice, "Look where your going in future."
Then you figured out, you two had swapped voice.
"Julie, do you notice anything strange about our voice?" you asked again, still freaked out by your little girl voice.
"No, you still have the same voice as always," she said getting up, and running off.
"What am I going to do?" You asked your self in your tiny voice.
12122.title: Julie (your younger sister)

1212221.content:
Realising it was a school day, you had to get your self ready. You had managed to get dressed, eat breakfast, grab your stuff, get on the bus, and get to school before any touched you.

That was all undone when your best friend.......
1212221.title: Thursday

12122212.content:
Stacy one of your best friends, slapped you on the back, you silented grunted in anger. Stacy came round.
“Morning Frosty.”
Trying to sound happier you say Hi.
“You may want to lose the attitude, you know the cheerleaders don't like it,” she says confusing you.
“You may also want to pick up the pace, their starting practice in 5 minute, I'll tell the teacher that you're in.”
You look in your hand to see a cheerleader outfit. You figured you must have swapped club activities.
12122212.title: Stacy

13.content:
What will happen in this swap?

Everyone around the world swaps bodies?

Everyone in the world faces one or more swaps?

Maybe each culture swaps some cultural traits?

Maybe everyone's families get swapped around somehow?
13.title: Global swap

132.content:
It started of as a normal morning, got up, had breakfast, got ready quickly because you were running late.
You ran out the door. You got to the front gate when a large flash hit you.
You couldn't see anything, and you fell to the floor.
When you got up you...
132.title: Global grand exchange

1321.content: Which result? (All are reader's choice)
1321.title: Result 1-3

13211.content:
You regained your vision, but something was wrong. You were shorter, and your hair was not only elbow length but it was blonde. The clothes that fit you were not to big, and there were two big lumps in your chest.

"What the hell!?!?!" You heard in the house.

You rush inside but trip over your big clothes. You look into a mirror to see you have turned into a woman!
13211.title: Result 1

132111.content:
You had turned into a teenage girl! A blonde hair school girl. Your were still wearing your old clothes, but they were much to big for you.

While trying to figure out what's going on, you hear screaming in the kitchen.

You rush over to find various unfamiliar people.

"What the hell is going on! I'm a fucking kid!"
It was your older sister Bethany, only now in the body of a ten year old. Your twin sister Lucy you find was in a female body around your age, but much shorter. Your youngest sister Julie was put into a 20 year old woman's body.

"What's happening! I'm scared...." Julie said

"Guys, where's mom and dad?" You asked.

Everybody ran to their room, only to find two babies. Your parents were now helpless, even more so as they have seemed to have lost there adult minds.

You and Lucy pick up you mom and dad respectfully.

"Okay, we need to get ahold of ourselves. Mom and Dad are in no condition to make orders. We need to get them baby stuff until we figure out what is going on." You said, taking charge. Your siblings agreed, but still scared endlessly.

"Me and Lucy will take Dad with us to find baby stuff. Beth you stay with Mom and Julie here." You said.

As you walk out the door carrying your infant father, Lucy stopped you for a second.

"Hey, before we do this you should borrow some of my clothes." Lucy said.

Looking down, you aggreed and went to her room first. Luckily you and Lucy has a very close bond, so she was patient with helping you with female clothing.

After getting ready, you, Lucy, and your baby father head out.
132111.title: Scenario 1

14.title: A game of trade

141.content:
This is a parallel universe where everyone's traits are stored on cards, with current and original owner with an image, in a deck with the person they compose.
This cards, and parts they represent, can be traded at will. Taking them means nothing, all sides must agree to the swap.
141.title: The trading card life/universe

1412.content: Will it be a parallel world were each person can freely swap bodies (as long as both consent).

choices: Swap in the world of Anime
Swap in the world of a TV series
Swap in the world of a book

15.content: How about some swaps in a fictional world?
15.title: Another method

choices: A crazy machine made by your Dad.
155.content: Will it be either of these methods?
155.title: A different swap completely

1551.content:
You're Dad was a mad scientist. He made strange inventions and sokd the harmless one, it was at a point where he was getting requests to make stuff.
One late morning on a saturday, you and Lucy sat bored, waiting for something intresting, when it walked it. Your Dad walked in, collapsed on the sofa, turned to football, and fell asleep. This means that he finished his most resent invention. You and Lucy ran down to the basement werre he worked and you two would catalogue all his investions, uses of them and photograph them. At the back a new one sat.
It was two pods attached to a console, you two couldn't wait to test it. Lucy stepped in ine and you pressed some buttons, no idea what they would do, and stepped in the other. Once you closed the door, it glowed and hummed, resulting in.....
1551.title: A crazy machine made by your Dad.

15511.content:
The doors opened and you both felt different. You looked down and was greated with a shock.
You were now wearing a thun pink hoodie over a red shirt dipicting a soul eater character, Death the Kid, a pleated black skirt reaching your knees, black tights covering all of your legs, a dark blue hairband in your hair and a gold coloured ring on your right middle finger. These were the clothes your sister was wearing moments ago, but sized for you.
Looking over at Lucy, you could see she was now wearing a black t-shirt depicting Lord Death of soul eater, she was also wearing cargo pants, and her feet were bare, just like you were. “So this machine swaps clothing?” she asks. “Not entriely,” you say picking up a necklace around her neck. “Why did this swap?” the console started speaking.
“Exchange analysis complete, one error detected,” you both go over to the console. Lucy starts to read “The exchange Froslad and Lucy, clothing swap. Only the two notice the swap, everyone sees it as normal. Knowedge of the clothing also swapped. Error Lucy's necklace couldn't be swapped inperfect. Sentamental bond rejected transfer.”
“Lets stay like this for a while,” Lucy agrees.
15511.title: Result 1

155111.content:
“Lets do more swaps,” she turns to you.
“I thiught we agreed to stay like this,” you pulled at the shoulders if your hoodie.
“Yes, but this machine can swap peoole from a distance.”
You like this idea, and nod.
She starts typing, a picture of Mum and Dad are brought up, to arrows pointing from one to the other, with a textbox inbetween shows up, the box was filled in with TV preferance. a TV showed by next to each of them, and the travel to the other one.
“Okay, now for Julie and Beth...” she thinks.
“Pride of body,” you suggested. Beth was proud of her body, while Julie was self conscious. Lucy did the same, and made it so only you two noticed the change.
You suggested that was it for now.
155111.title: More swaps

1551111.content:
“I think we should leave it at that,” you say to Lucy, who agreed and you both walked out.
Looking around for any changes, the biggest one was that Dad was now sleeping though some ballet show, which Mum would watch when she had time to herself.
Then Mum walked in, quietly took the remote from Dad, and changed over to football, turning it down. “Are you two okay, looks like your waiting for something?”
“No, but is their something strange about our clothes?” you point to your pink attire. She shook her head, szying nothing had change. You and Lucy left the room in which Mother was enjoying football.
1551111.title: Lucy agreed

15511112.content:
A few hours had passed, Mum had gone to run some errands, Beth and Julie were away with friend for the day, and Dad was now upstair sleeping in his room. You were still getting used to the feel of the girls clothing.

There was a knocking at the door, you went to answer it. Your aunty Margret (younger sister of your mother) stood there.
“Good afternoon Froslad” she said oblivious to your changes, you greeted her, “I was going to visit a friend of mine, but Stephaine didn't want to, I suggested coming here, and she agreed, so would you mind watching her for a while?” you said it wouldnlt be a problem, so your cousin Stepaine comes in and Margret leaves.

Soon Lucy is back downstairs, and you explain, but while you two were talking she had disappeared. You both go look for her, when you get to the kitchen, you remeber that the basement door was open. You run door, the console had been used recently, running over to the open pod, as she couldn't open them, you went in and the door closed you could here her giggling, no idea what was going on. The pods glowed.
What was swapped?

(You and Lucy will remeber, and maybe Stephaine, your 4 year old female cousin, will remeber to.)
15511112.title: Later on

choices: Maybe a new shop deals in human traits?
1553.content: What else could do it?
1553.title: Something else

15531.content: A new shop opened on the corner. With technology to seperate body parts and reatach other parts, remove mental traits and implant others. Why did you go there?
15531.title: Maybe a new shop deals in human traits?

15533.content: How about you meet and befriend someone who has the power to swap?
15533.title: Another option

choices: I can swap anything, and I choose how people remember
His swap powers work a little different
155331.content:
It started of as an ordinary day, nothing was different. Waking up, hating the sun raising, trying to get ready, leaving too early for your likes, the bus drive was boringly uneventful and uncomfortable as even, getting into class for registration, and that when it happened.

"Everyone, a new student has moved in, place welcome, Edward Paws," and then a new student walked in, he was a little shorted than average, he was wearing his uniform, but it was arranged very well, kind of through on, but he had a grazed look in his eye, "Take a seat next to Stardust."
He came and sat down, "Hi," he said holding out his hand, you shook it as part of common decency.
He leaned over, which was a little creepy, and whispered, "I have a power, do you want to know about it."
You didn't believe him, but you humoured him, "what is it?" you whispered back.
"......."
155331.title: An acquaintance has the power

155332.content: Maybe you inexplicably swap bodies with someone you know?
155332.title: The body swap

info.brief_description: Various paths, all like to a large variety of swaps
info.description:
Your name is your own handle, you are 16
You have a mother (36, Annabelle) and Father (35, Jeremy), an older sister (18, Bethany) twin sister (16, Lucy) and little sister (12, Julie).
But that might change though all the swaps.
Any swap is allowed and probably encouraged, any other content is allowed but kept anything sexual to minimal detail.
If I feel something has gone to far I will contact you.
Have fun.
